version_description:
+++ COSTA GUETA! The Adventure continues in this NEW episode +++
We know how long you've been waiting, and hope you'll enjoy exploring this COOL new area!
ALSO IN THIS VERSION
- New and exclusive area - Mountain Krembo!
- Online Arena battles now feature item usage limit to improve overall experience
- Minor changes, bug fixes and stability improvements
+++ Thanks for your great reviews and responses! +++
Fixed an issue preventing players from entering Winterdale.
